column1: Jobabo is a municipality and town in the Las Tunas Province of Cuba. It is located in the southern part of the province
column2: 34 km (21 mi) south of Las Tunas

column1: Jobabo is named from the taino word jobabol
column2: meaning "a place where many jobo trees grow".
the municipality of Jobabo had a population of 49
column3: 403. With a total area of 884 km2 (341 sq mi)
column4: it has a population density of 55.9/km2 (145/sq mi).
